name: @nartallax/opis-dump-webgui
description: Web GUI for dumps from patched Opis mod for Minecraft
author: Nartallax

scripts.release: npm run typecheck && npm run release:prepare && npm run release:client
scripts.release:client: npm run icons:generate && npx parcel build --target client_release --no-cache && mv dist/client_release/* target
scripts.dev: npm run typecheck && npm run icons:generate && npm run dev:client & npx serve -l 61537 --no-port-switching --cors & wait
scripts.icons:generate: npx icon-font-tool --svg-dir src/icons --font-path src/generated/icons --font-normalize --font-descent 150 --css-path src/generated/icons.css --ts-path src/generated/icons.ts --ts-css-import-style star --ts-name Icon
